title: The Velvet Revolution: Optimism, companionship, and freedom
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
Ľubica Lacinová, a researcher at the Centre of Biological Sciences of the Slovak Academy of Sciences in Bratislava, recalls communist times and the Velvet Revolution (Nežná revolúcia). 
 
Photo: TASR (The Velvet Revolution Square street sign)
